```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# create a random sample of size 10 from a standard Normal distribution
set.seed(111)
column1 = rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 1)

# create a  logical vector indicating whether elements of the sample are greater than 0
column2 = c(column1 > 0)

# create a character vector of length 10
column3 = c("Roxy's", "favourite", "fruits", "are", "apples", "strawberries", "mangos", "blueberries", "and", "avocados")
length(column3)

column4 = c("30%_sugar", "sugar_free", "30%_sugar", "70%_sugar", "sugar_free", "30%_sugar", "sugar_free", "70%_sugar", "70%_sugar", "30%_sugar")
length(column4)

df = data_frame(column1, column2, column3, column4)
```
